p: Ribavirin is a nucleotides derivative competing with physiological nucleotide for RdRp active site [ 60, 61]. Through the outbreak of SARS in Hong Kong, ribavirin was widely used for patients with or without the simultaneous use of steroids [ 62]. The EC 50 against COVID-19 for Ribavirin determined at 109.5 μM [ 63]. Based on previous studies about SARS and MERS, the combination of ribavirin and IFN-β, decreases the viral replication and disease severity in animal models [ 64]. Due to unfavorable reactions, the proper dose of ribavirin in the clinical application should be given carefully.
